title: font that used in DK pocket eyewitness
content:
Can anyone tell me what font is this? This is urgent  
This font i get from DK pocket eyewitness. somewhat roundish i guess  
Grateful for help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107205530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dk%20001_6289.jpg)
author: aliy

comments.content:
Small scale blurs some details, but I think its [Helvetica Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107205530/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/).  
Don
